text:
@DineshDSouza Be sure to make sim adjust to your Flu death totals when you make your EOY comparison, Dinesh. 

Actually, why don’t you come visit (w/out PPE gear) COVID-19 patients and 1st resp in your old city of NY if you’re so confident the risk is low. Can stop by King’s College...oh wait
